properties.description: Provides external access to the Hub (central) data managed by the Glennis Solutions' suite of products.
Creates the specified Business Unit to be used within the Glennis Solutions' suite of products.

request.description: Details of the Business Unit to be created.

responses.description: The specified Business Unit was created.  See the Content-Location header value for the resource location of the Business Unit.

headers.name: Content-Location
headers.description: The URL to access the created resource.

responses.description: There is something wrong with the request; check the response body for details.
A Business Unit with the specified identifier already exists.

templateParameters.name: businessUnitId
templateParameters.description: Identifier of the Business Unit to delete.

properties.description: Deletes the specified Business Unit.

request.description: Specifying the actionUserName is required; optionally the actionDateTime can be specified.

responses.description: Successfully deleted the specified Business Unit.
There is something wrong with the request; check the response body for details.
The specified Business Unit was not found.

templateParameters.name: businessUnitId
templateParameters.description: Identifier of the Business Unit to retrieve

properties.description: Retrieves the specified Business Unit used within the Glennis Solutions' suite of products.

responses.description: Successfully retrieved the specified Business Unit whose details are provided in the response body.
There is something wrong with the request; check the response body for details.
The specified Business Unit was not found.

templateParameters.name: businessUnitId
templateParameters.description: Identifier of the Business Unit to be updated.

properties.description: Updates the specified Business Unit.

request.description: The details of the Business Unit to be updated.

queryParameters.name: CreateIfNotExists
queryParameters.description: If true, the specified Business Unit will be created if it does not already exist.

responses.description: The specified Business Unit was created.
The specified Business Unit was updated.
No changes were detected; so, no database operation was performed.
There is something wrong with the request; check the response body for details.
The specified Business Unit was not found (and CreateIfNotExists is false).

properties.description: Retrieves the list of active Business Units managed by the Glennis Solutions' suite of products.

responses.description: Successfully retrieved the list of active Business Units whose details are provided in the response body.
